          <title>
            <string language="sl">Premi govor - utrjevanje zapisa</string>
            <string language="en">Direct speech - notation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Direkte Rede - Darstellung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Discours direct - notation</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenec najprej utrjuje zapis narekovajev. Nato dopolni s spremnimi stavki. Nalogo lahko rešuje na računalniku, jo natisne in pokaže učitelju.</string>
            <string language="en">How to correctly notate direct speech - use of different punctuation marks.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sl">premi govor</string>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment correctement discours direct de notate -

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como corretamente discurso direto do notate - uso
de marcas de pontuação diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come correttamente discorso diretto del notate -

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo correctamente discurso directo del notate -
